## CompSubNode class

Component-wise subtraction

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class CompSubNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a - b for each component. Both inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4).
